name: Admin-console Release 21.0
description: This new release of the LoginRadius Admin Console brings additional options that allow you to configure security measures on who has access to login.

ADDED.text: IP Access Control: We have added a new IP Access Control section under auth security which can be used to add allowed/denied IPs for API access.
QQ Tencent Captcha Menu: New section added under Auth Security to easily configure your Tencent QQ Captcha.
Suspend Account Lockout type: Added a new 'Suspend Account'  lockout type under 'Auth Security' in the Brute Force Lockout section, which allows you to set accounts as suspended.
